wikipedia_page.main: Neil Sang (born 23 May 1972) is an English former professional footballer who played in the Football League for Torquay United. He went on to work as a football agent and currently represents Tom Davies who plays for Everton F.C. and is the captain of the England U19 team.  His son Tom is a footballer at Championship club Cardiff City

response: In June 2005 his agent was Neil Sang.
Sang was born in Liverpool, England. His father, Neil Sang, is a former professional footballer and agent.
